text: "Dr. Lamabam Kamal Singh" () (b.1899, d. 1935) was a writer of Meitei literature of Modern Manipur. He is one of the pioneer writers of his arena. By profession, he was a doctor. He is best known for "Madhavi", the first fiction novel in Meitei language (Manipuri language). ==Related pages== * Sandrembi Chaisra ==Further reading== * https://nenow.in/north-east- news/manipur/manipur-dr-kamal-literary-complex-inaugurated-ahead-poetry- festival.html * http://www.uniindia.com/minister-inaugurates-literary-complex- in-name-of-dr-kamal/states/news/1375246.html * https://www.goodreads.com/author/show/20437259.Dr_Lamabam_Kamal ==Bibliography== * ==References== Category:Meitei people Category:Meitei literature
title: Lamabam Kamal
